title: "Skarner isn't broken" - Skarner from my last match
body:
http://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/scale_super/15/152349/2307282-55860__jj_jameson_laughing_meme_1.jpg

Didn't believe me when I said he had 63% Ranked winrate either.  At least he was a good sport and joined my Vilemaw dance party
